mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow (customer_id, following_id, created_at) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{followingId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS user_id, c.profile_image, c.nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE customer_id = #{sessionUserId} AND following_id = c.id) AS is_following FROM follow f JOIN customer c ON f.customer_id = c.id WHERE f.following_id = #{userId}
